code: import{useEffect,useState}from"react";import{getAuth,onAuthStateChanged}from'firebase/auth';import Home from"./home";import Login from'../Login';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Dashboard=()=>{const[user,setUser]=useState(null);const auth=getAuth();useEffect(()=>{onAuthStateChanged(auth,user=>{if(user){setUser(user);}else{setUser(null);}});},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:user?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Home,{}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Login,{})});};export default Dashboard;
